Description
At BASF , we create chemistry - and have been doing so for 150 years. As the world's leading chemical company ,
we combine economic success with environmental protection and social responsibility . Through science and
innovation we enable our customers in nearly every industry to meet the current and future needs of society .
BASF is the global leader in process catalysts. W e provide fluid catalytic cracking (FCC) refinery catalysts, custom
catalysts, chemical catalysts, and adsorbent solutions.
BASF is currently seeking a T echnology Manager to focus on gas treatment and purification of hydrocarbons
utilizing adsorbent solutions. The primary role of the T echnology Manager is to identify business opportunities and
convert them into business through technical dialogue with customers and selling value of BASF technology .
 
Major T asks and Accountabilities:
Provide technical consulting to customers (choose the right product, solution, or technology) including
troubleshooting, in alignment with Commercial Account Manager (CAM)
Provide technical proposals / quotation to the customer in consultation with Global Marketing Manager , in
alignment with Commercial Account Manager (CAM)
Develop performance warranty of fers including price proposal in alignment with Global Marketing Manager
Drive opportunity management process internally (lead generation and qualification, solution development)
Collect and document technology , customer and competitor intelligence
Provide market/customer driven ideas and projects for incremental innovations
Manage product quality issues within the non-conformance management system
Provide customer consultation and on-site support
Interface with other business divisions of BASF as needed to provide complete solutions to customers
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Chemistry / Chemical Engineering, or a related field required
5+ years of technical experience in a role focused on hydrocarbon or petrochemical processing required
Strong analytical skills required
Strong written and verbal communication skills required
Experience working as part of a team required
2 years of experience within a customer facing role is an asset
Experience in catalysis or adsorption is an asset
Experience in process engineering or process design is an asset
Experience providing customers with technical proposals and designs is an asset
Must be willing and able to travel approximately 30% of the time; travel may be as high as 50% during peak
business need. Primarily in Middle East and India
 
   Languages:
English professional. Arabic, Hindi and/or French is an asset.
